comment._content: What yr was the photo from Scotts Mills taken? I grew up there from 1960-1980. Visit it often still have family there. I loved growing up there, best childhood ever. I would love to see more old pics.

comment._content: Hi pattyM60- The photo was taken in 1910. You can see the full record in our digital collection here oregondigital.org/u?/gwilliams,274 Tiah
